text: Patrick Wayne Swayze (August 18, 1952 â€“ September 14, 2009) was an American actor, singer, songwriter and dancer. He was born in Houston, Texas. He had starred in many successful Hollywood movies, including Red Dawn (1984), Dirty Dancing (1987), Ghost (1990), and Point Break (1991). Swayze's film career was started in the Coppola movie The Outsiders (1983). Swayze was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in January 2008. He died in 2009, in Los Angeles, California, at the age of 57. He was married to Lisa Niemi from 1975 and until his death. The couple owned a horse ranch in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Swayze did not have children. == References == ==Other websites== *Patrick Swayze -The Movie Database Category:1952 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Actors from Houston Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from Houston Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas
title: Patrick Swayze
